title: Ravindra College of Engineering for Women: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Ravindra College of Engineering for Women Admission 2024 is open for various degree programs based on AP EAPCET and other entrance exam scores. Check latest updates and news on JNTUA Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Rankings

Ravindra College of Engineering for Women Library
description: The Library is housed in a large area and contains text books, reference books, journals, magazine, newspapers, etc. related to various departments like Engineering and Technology, Management, and Humanities.

The Collection includes over 18656 volumes of books and 500 CDs. The Central Library also subscribes 100 National and International Print Journals and over 1236 Infotrac Engineering databases of e-Journals.

basic_info.name: Ravindra College of Engineering for Women Hostel
description: Hostel accommodation is provided to all the girl applicants. On an average 50% of the total students stay in hostels. The facilities provided in the hostel are recreation rooms, sanitarium, sports, etc. Hostellers are provided Cot, Table, Chair and a large sized Cupboard.

Section.name: About RCEW
Section.description:
Established in 2008, Ravindra College of Engineering for Women is spread in a beautiful zone of 5 acres, located just four kms from Kurnool town in Andhra Pradesh. The college has got its affiliation from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur. Apart from this, approval to this college is granted by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi.
Ravindra College of Engineering for Women AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
